product_name: Novara Mezzo Capri Bike Tights - Women's
long_description: Our women's Novara Mezzo capri bike tights feature a nonbinding waist, a Gelspot chamois pad and more coverage than shorts for cool-weather cycling. 4-way stretch fabric and 8-panel construction provide support for hard-working muscles; moisture-wicking, quick-drying finish increases comfort. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Yoga-inspired waistband features a crossover stretch fabric in front for superior comfort when you're tucked over the bike. Novara Gelspot chamois features a microfiber covering that wicks moisture away; ergonomic shaping and smooth, sonic-welded seams reduce friction. Women-specific, ergonomically-shaped gel chamois conforms to body contours; high-density foam helps provide comfort on the bike. Mesh back panel ventilates and allows moisture vapor to escape quickly. Rear envelope style pocket self closes to keep small items secure. Novara Mezzo capri bike tights have flat seams that are non-chafing next to skin. Silicone elastic grippers keep hems from riding up legs.
